message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This exceptional item is priced at $950000, which I believe strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the return on my investment. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1000000, and I am confident this offer reflects its true worth while allowing me to achieve a satisfactory outcome. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this proposal.
